DESCRIPTION: Takes #b10% more damage for each stack of Hunted on them. When applied, all other hunted enemies are no longer hunted, and other enemies take #b10% less damage for each stack. Reduces by #b1 each turn.

At the end of the turn, gain Block. When taking unblocked attack damage, remove this.
At the end of the turn, gain Block. When taking unblocked attack damage, reduce by 1.
Non-lethal damage will leave targets at 1 HP.
